column3: LaTeXThis refers to the direct output of raw LaTeX (often in a format similar to the BibTeX-generated .bbl files).  Many programs can export BibTeX (see above table), which can then be processed into LaTeX.
yesDatabase can be exported as a whole in BibTeX format. Text (i.e. thoughts, comments, and quotations) can be fed into a number of TeX editors in LaTeX code or UTF-8,
